Articles.Content:
In modulemanager.2.5.13.dll, there is a virus called WS.REPUTATION.1

I found this version in the latest version of the Ferram AeroSpace download folder.

What makes you think there's a virus? Sarbian (the developer of module manager) and Ferram (developer of FAR) are highly respected mod authors who wouldn't intentionally include a virus in their mods. Where did you download that copy of FAR? Was it through the official channels mentioned on the FAR forum page?

http://community.norton.com/en/forums/clarification-wsreputation1-detection

So this is Norton code for "It is most likely fine but daddy told me to be scared of things I don't know".

My advice would be to unistall Norton and replace it with a real working AV.

Or don't use module manager. Your choice. Really.

Edited April 10, 2015 by sarbian
